snippet: In its third year, Qualia Fest, a gathering of musically inclined philosophers and neuroscientists, will continue to promote the overlap of theorists and practical researchers through music.
abstract: Qualia Fest, gathering of musically inclined philosophers and neuroscientists, will continue to promote the overlap that has emerged among theorists and practical researchers in its third annual gathering; participants say that common bond of music is helping scientists from both realms communicate more deeply with one another.
lead_paragraph: In its third year, Qualia Fest, a gathering of musically inclined philosophers and neuroscientists, will continue to promote the overlap of theorists and practical researchers through music.

headline.seo: Jamming About the Mind at Qualia Fest
headline.main: Where Theory and Research Meet to Jam About the Mind
headline.print_headline: Where Theory and Research Meet to Jam About the Mind
